segments.text: Hmm . Let me try something.Wait . I have a reservation for someone named Sang here . But it's spelled J - A - N - G . It's not spelled J - I - A - N - G . It's for a Mr . C Sang .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that must be me ! Probably they typed the name wrong.My husband's English isn't so good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sometimes it happens , Ma'am . That's why it is always good to carry your confirmation number . I'm sorry about the inconvenience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's okay . It's probably my husband's fault.Is there a pool in this hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course.The pool is open until 10:00 p . m . So you still have about 45 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is your key . Your room is 379.You can find the elevators just around that corner there , down the hall.Enjoy your stay , Ma'am .
segments.speaker: S1
